Title: Cat stuck up a tree
Desc: There is a cat stck up a tree
Options: Take a squad with a fire engine all dressed up with press
Reaction: You dressed up for nothing. You get less grants
Luckily you dressed up. the press was there. They liked your style!
You saved the cat from the tree
There was press there. If you sent a dressed up engine you would have gotten more grants

Options: Leave the call. The cat can get down by itself
Reaction: The cat falls off the tree and hurts itself
The cat gets down from tree by itself

Title: Kitchen fire
Desc: A small kitchen fire in a restaurant with the worst food in town
Reaction: Why would you let it burn down? your job is to put fires out
The whole town cheered and each gave you some change!
The smell of food threw your team off and they couldn't put the fire out
Because of all the bad food the kitchen went up in flames immedatly and you couldn't save it
You managed to save the restaurant
The owner was not happy becuase you didn't pay for your visit to his shop. You needed to pay him some some of your wages
The owner was not happy becuase you didn't pay for your visit to his shop. You needed to pay him some some of your wages
